schema:name: Still--Italy

schema:publisher.schema:name: University of California, Davis. General Library. Dept. of Special Collections

wine_label:marginalia: "At the Ristorante Buca di S. Ruffello Florence. good sound red table wine. Worth 90 cents and more. Needs age and not 1949 (as labeled) but withal a wine worthy of drinking nightly or weekly. Not as good as the older wine at Doney's the night before by a long ways but pleasant. Red [St?] 78. During my Italian stay usually had the "house" wine at lunch. Usually poor."
